title: Open Explore from Panel Menu
description: Opens the Explore view from a panel's menu. Note: The panel menu selector contains the metric/panel name which varies.

blocks.content: Click **Explore** to open this visualization in Explore.

notes: This selector targets the Explore menu item after the panel menu is open. To open the panel menu itself, you need a selector like button[data-testid*='Panel menu'] but the testid includes the panel/metric name which varies by context.
